mapper.select: SELECT A.MENU_ID , B.MENU_NAME , B.MENU_URL , B.PARENT_MENU_ID , B.SORT_ORDER , B.IS_VISIBLE FROM TB_ROLE_MENU A , TB_MENU B WHERE A.ROLE_ID = ( SELECT A.ROLE_ID FROM KOOBS97.TB_USER_ROLE A WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId} ) AND A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID ORDER BY B.SORT_ORDER

SELECT A.LOG_ID , A.USER_ID , A.ACTIVITY_TYPE , A.ACTIVITY_RESULT , A.REQUEST_IP , A.REQUEST_URI , A.REQUEST_METHOD , A.ERROR_MESSAGE , A.USER_AGENT , A.CREATED_AT FROM USER_ACTIVITY_LOG A ORDER BY A.LOG_ID
